Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1980...
Injured on 7/25/1983 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 5/25/1984...
Injured on 7/28/1985 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/1/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 4/26/1993 to a minor league deal...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1994, winning 2 games with a 3.21 ERA...
